name: Lava Moon
description:
*IMPORTANT* If you can't input with keyboard, keep refreshing the page until you can!

You are the last survivor on Moon-X568 and Moon-Y138 because it has been overrun with lava! Everyone you knew is no longer around, as they have turned into lava creatures. It's up to you to save your tiny two moons and stop the lava!

Controls:

  • Move: Arrow Keys
  • Switch Weapon: Z
  • Fire: Spacebar
  • Gameover: Enter
